396910.name: ESCHATOS Original Soundtrack (Steam Edition)
396910.description:
Click here to preview the Eschatos Original Soundtrack!

This is the Eschatos Original Soundtrack. Yousuke Yasui presents a fantastic retro-synth soundtrack filled with inspirational and catchy tunes. Strongly recommended and a fan favorite.

Includes 17 CD-quality lossless audio tracks. Tracks will be downloaded to your Eschatos Steam folder.
